survey_brief: This survey aims to understand the preferences and challenges of digital nomads to better cater to their unique lifestyle needs.

questions.question_text: How long have you been living as a digital nomad?
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button for single-choice selection. Ensure options cover a broad range of experience levels.

No, planning to settle down soon
